# PluginSmith

> A free, open-source macOS app that turns documentation into production-ready Claude Code plugins and skills.

PluginSmith is a native macOS application for developers who use Claude Code. It provides a visual, three-step workflow to create plugins without writing boilerplate.

## What it does

- Imports documentation (Markdown, PDF, Word, Excel, web URLs)
- Uses AI to analyze sources and suggest plugin structure
- Generates complete Claude Code plugins with commands, skills, agents, and hooks
- Exports directly to Claude's local marketplace or as distributable packages

## Key details

- Platform: macOS 15.0+
- License: MIT
- Cost: Free (requires your own Anthropic API key)
- Author: Roel van Roozendaal
- Language: Swift / SwiftUI

## Links

- Website: https://pluginsmith.app
- GitHub: https://github.com/vRoozendaal/PluginSmith
- Full documentation: https://pluginsmith.app/llms-full.txt
